assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: CA.G. and J.R.H. have filed patent applications related to genome editing for Duchenne muscular dystrophy. C.A.G. is an advisor to Editas Medicine, a company engaged in development of therapeutic genome editing.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
